srwwikisummarytemplateeditor-desc: Helps editing summary templates on Super Robot Wars Wiki.
summarytemplateeditor-summary: On this page, you can generate the wiki markup of a summary template for this wiki easily.
srwste-load-template-description: To edit an existing template, select the template page from the following field.
srwste-enter-items: Enter the items in the text box below, one item per line. You can specify the label with the following format:
srwste-separate-items: To separate items, insert a line beginning with ---- between items.
